entities.name: letters
entities.description: Letters are mentioned as coming down the chimney and pelting out of the fireplace.

entities.name: Dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as ducking from the letters.

entities.name: Harry

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as throwing Harry into the hall and slamming the door shut.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as running out with her arms over her face.

entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as running out with his arms over his face.

entities.name: kitchen chimney
entities.description: The kitchen chimney is mentioned as the source of the letters.
